body_html:
We lost two safety checks on complexity:

  1. Stopping merging when there are too many inputs to the subgraph to scan.
  2. Bounding the distance we're willing to move a node.
    Are these big problems in practice? If so, I can try to replicate.

body:
We lost two safety checks on complexity:
1. Stopping merging when there are too many inputs to the subgraph to scan.
2. Bounding the distance we're willing to move a node.
Are these big problems in practice? If so, I can try to replicate.
